explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a male chef in a white chef's uniform is standing in front of a large pot. On the countertop to the left of the pot, there is a white plate. He is holding a pancake in his right hand. The pot is filled with stewed meat. There is a brown door frame on the right, the beige wall on the left has gray decorations, and some kitchenware is piled up below.
